translations: adj.[机]铆接的；用铆钉钉牢的；结了婚的
v.用铆钉固定，敲进去，注目（rivet 的过去式和过去分词形式）

sentences.sentence: I was absolutely riveted by her story.
sentences.translation: 我完全被她的故事吸引住了。

sentences.sentence: The steel plates were riveted together.
He was riveted to the John Wayne movie.
sentences.translation: 他痴迷于约翰•韦恩的电影。
